Black Friday 2018: Save on Ring security cameras at Amazon

Share
Tweet
What's This?
Just to let you know, if you buy something featured here, Mashable might earn an affiliate commission.
By Kevin BillingsMashable Deals2018-11-23 11:49:31 UTC

Black Friday is a great chance to save on home security. And if you're looking for a non-invasive, easy-to-set-up option, Amazon has a deals on Ring security cameras and systems that just so happen to make great gifts. 

SEE ALSO: All the best Black Friday 2018 sales, right in one place

Ring Video Doorbell 2 — $139 (list price $199)

If you want to keep an eye on the front door, the Ring Video Doorbell 2 can kill two birds with one stone. Thanks to a built-in motion sensor and app, you'll be able to see whoever comes by, whether its an Amazon delivery or the pizza guy. If you don't know them at all, the camera features a two-way speaker, that way you can grill them before possibly opening the door.

And if you've been meaning to replace that old doorbell, you'll finally have a proper replacement. All you have to decide is if you want to stick with rechargeable batteries or wire it into the house.




Ring Video Doorbell 2 — $139
See Details

Ring Spotlight Camera — Get two for $249 

For anyone concerned about the general state of their property, the Ring Spotlight Cameras are an easy option to start building a security camera network. And thanks to this special from Amazon for Black Friday, you'll be able to get a head start.

The Spotlight Cam uses motion detectors so it doesn't have to be recording 24/7. Once it's paired up with your Wi-Fi and you've downloaded the Ring app, you'll get alerted any time the motion detectors go off. Priced at $199 for one, get two for Black Friday for $249 and save $149.




Ring Spotlight Camera — 2 for $249 ($199 each)
See Details

Ring Alarm — $169 (list price $199)

Keeping the outside of the house safe is important, but you can't overlook the inside. You wouldn't put up half a roof, so why would you invest in only half a security setup?

The 5-piece kit will cover your home to ensure nothing out of the ordinary is happening, regardless of time of day. The system includes a base station, motion detector, keypad, contact sensor, and a range extender to keep the inside of your house as safe as the outside. Once set up, paired with Wi-Fi, and connected to your Ring app, you'll get alerts if it picks up movement in the doors or windows. And if you want professional monitoring for your home, an extra $10 will ensure your family and home's safety.




Ring Alarm Security System — $169 (list price $199)
See Details
